title: Start
body:
{StudioExec}
Glad you could make it kid, I've got a hell of a favour to ask you.

[[I'll do it!|doit]]
[[Favour?|explain]]

title: doit
body:
{StudioExec}
Enthusiasm, that's what I like to see! You've got some moxy kid, you'll go far in this business.

Now: that favour. You familiar with the Joey Dinger show?

[[I don't think so.|explain2]]

title: explain
explain2
okay
body:
{StudioExec}
Anyway, the producer called in sick. Some kind of fever. I don't ask questions, I make television. You're gonna have to cover for his worthless ass.

You up for the challenge?

[[Do I have a choice?|accept]]

title: accept
body:
{StudioExec}
You've got a great sense of humour, kid, I'll give you that!

Now I know you're familiar with the whole process, but let me make a couple of things clear:

[[Okay|gulp]]

title: gulp
body:
{StudioExec}
Joey Dinger is a total idiot. If you don't tell him exactly what to say, the whole thing will fall apart.

If tears are being shed, you're doing the right thing.

[[Got it|next]]

title: next
body:
{StudioExec}
If you see pain in the eyes of one of the guests, I want to see it too, up close and personal.

This show needs ratings. Top ratings. The only way to get those ratings is to produce like you've never produced before.

[[Yes sir|go]]

title: go
body:
{StudioExec}
Your first job is to pick titles for the each segment. Remember: we need those ratings!

Now get the hell out of here.

[[Start|endScene]]
